member.name: RM_FILTER_INFO
member.summary: Contains information about modifications to restart or shutdown actions. Add, remove, and list modifications to specified applications and services that have been registered with the Restart Manager session by using the , , and the functions.

member.name: RM_FILTER_INFO.FilterAction
member.summary: This member contains a enumeration value. Use the value RmNoRestartto prevent the restart of the application or service. Use the value RmNoShutdown to prevent the shutdown and restart of the application or service.

member.name: RM_FILTER_INFO.FilterTrigger
member.summary: This member contains a enumeration value. Use the value RmFilterTriggerFile to modify the restart or shutdown actions of an application referenced by the executable's full path filename. Use the value RmFilterTriggerProcess to modify the restart or shutdown actions of an application referenced by a structure. Use the value RmFilterTriggerServiceto modify the restart or shutdown actions of a service referenced by the short service name.

member.name: RM_FILTER_INFO.cbNextOffset
member.summary: The offset in bytes to the next structure.

member.name: RM_FILTER_INFO.strFilename
member.summary: If the value of FilterTrigger is RmFilterTriggerFile, this member contains a pointer to a string value that contains the application filename.

member.name: RM_FILTER_INFO.Process
member.summary: If the value of FilterTrigger is RmFilterTriggerProcess, this member is a structure for the application.

member.name: RM_FILTER_INFO.strServiceShortName
member.summary: If the value of FilterTrigger is RmFilterTriggerService this member is a pointer to a string value that contains the short service name.
